newsitem.title: USA: Energy Conversion sets license pact.
newsitem.headline: Energy Conversion sets license pact.

text.p: Energy Conversion Devices Inc said Tuesday it has licensed its proprietary thin-film coating technology to Southwall Technologies Inc.
No financial terms were announced for the agreement, which also includes a joint development program.

Energy Conversion will receive royalties from Southwall sales of thin-film coating products using its technologies. Energy Conversion spokesman Stephen Hudgens said he does not know when that will occur.
Palo Alto, Calif.-based Southwall has about $60 million in annual sales of thin-film coating products, Hudgens said.
